name: Spoiler Alert!
description: Helping you use it, before you lose it. Spoiler Alert is a food inventory and status tracking application. Users can sign-in to view items, add items, update item quantities, and remove items from their refrigerator. When items near their expiration date, Spoiler Alert! will send an alert to the userâ€™s email informing him/her of the item that is near expiration.

name: Property-Mover
description: Web application where the user is able to find a place to live within a certain price range, compare any distance and commute time.

name: ForMe
description: This is a mobile responsive web application that helps to collect data from the user and notify by email with an attachment with the information collected to the party interested. Notifying every time that the user has upload information or update information.

name: Weather-Dashboard
description: Weather Dashboard that retrieves data form another application's API

name: Clicky Game!
description: Memory game with React. This web application has been divided into components, manage component state, and respond to user events.

name: Eat that burger
description: This application creates a burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!). Following the MVC design pattern; using Node and MySQL to query and route data in app and Handlebars to generate your HTML.

name: Password-Generator
description: Web application that generates a costume password, where  special characters, numeric, uppercase or lowercase could be included

name: Workout-Tracker
description: Workout tracker application that connects with a Mongo database with a Mongoose schema and handle routes with Express.

name: Express-Note-Taker
description: Application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes. This application will use an express backend and save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.
